Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
sc2002_grpproject.controller.StaffController
public class StaffController extends Object
Controller class for handling career center staff business logic. Manages approval workflows for company representatives and internship postings. Provides filtering capabilities and statistical reporting for administrative oversight.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002_SCEA_Group3
